document_name: National Strategy and Action Plan to Combat Soil Degradation 2011-2016
document_url: https://cdn.climatepolicyradar.org/BDI/2011/BDI-2011-12-25-National Strategy and Action Plan to Combat Soil Degradation 2011-2016_8b9cc73dba63dbd1da65fa9e39472644.pdf
document_description: The National Strategy and Action Plan to Combat Soil Degradation (SN-LDS) is intended to be an instrument for integrating all actions to be carried out for better soil conservation. It should serve as a framework for operationalizing the political will expressed in the PRSP II in the fight against soil degradation.
